basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student studying Management of Information Systems at the University of Hawaii at Manoa at the Shidler college of Business

work.company: UH Manoa Athletics, Les Murakami Baseball Stadium
work.summary: Prepared Stadium for all needs from the Universities team, outside parties, and to meet regulations
highlights: Worked many of the games and managed the grounds crew members

work.company: UH Manoa Sinclair Library, Student Success Serivces
work.summary: Was the 'face' of Sinclair library by helping and assisting any of the students, staff, or visitors of Sinclair Library.
Worked on many Landscape and Hardscape worksites to create the customers visions and requests.
highlights: Worked on industrial and resedential worksites
Learned how to effectively communicate, understand, and work on a large jobsite

work.summary: Greeted and assisted customers and members upon arrival to the course as well as when they return from their round/ Managed the tee times of the course and when it was certain groups times.
highlights: Learned how to effectively manage the outdoor and indoor operations of a golf club
Answered any questions and addressed any concerns from the golfres or supervisors.

volunteer.summary: Assited for one day, learning more about the history and functions of the fishponds, and helped rebuild and renew the fish pond.
